api_list.name: getOrderById
api_list.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10.         Other values will generated exceptions

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getPetById
getInventory
api_list.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://petstore_sample_api.p.rapidapi.com/store/inventory"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "petstore_sample_api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
